import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' const Contact = () => { const [data, setdata] = useState({ fullname:" ", phone:" ", email:" ", msg : " ", }); const InputEvent = (event) =>{ const{name,value} = event.target; setdata ((preVal) => { return { ...preVal, [name] : value, } }) } return (

Contact Me

) } export default Contact
